::Zardus::

Zardus nods, shaking Jaws' hand as the bot holds it out. "I am 
Zardus, yes. If you're joining the Alliance, you don't need to worry 
about Predacon or Maximal. We're neither."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> Jaws:
> 
> 
> 
> Jaws walked up to Zardus, holding out a hand.  "I am Jaws, I have 
only newly 
> arrived.  I'm afraid my memory circuitry is damaged.  I do not know 
if I am 
> Predacon or Maximal.  I take it you're Zardus?"
